name: TAMAPOTCHI
notes: Tamapotchi is a plant version Tamagotchi game built using JS, HTML, and CSS. Users can plant, take care of, and watch their flower grow, while avoiding over-watering, over-fertilizing, pesticide overuse, and inadequate sunlight to prevent it from dying.

name: BEER FRIDGE
notes: Beer fridge is a CRUD app built with JS, Express, Node, MongoDB, Mongoose, EJS, and CSS. Users can view, add, edit, and delete beers, as well as move them around for fun.
